does this really work? how do i do it?

How do use this:
On your memory card, put both the "PSP_GAME" folder and "UMD_DATA.BIN" in the root (so if the psp is d: on your computer it will be D:PSP_GAME and D:UMD_DATA.BIN

The GAME folder is put inside a PSP folder under you memory card. So it will look like this:
D:PSPGAMELuminesMS
D:PSPGAMELuminesMS%

Now you can run lumines under Game/Memory Stick in your PSP. One of the folders (LuminesMS) will look corrupted but its supposed to be that way. If you want to hide it rename the folders this way:
"D:PSPGAMELuminesMS"
-> "D:PSPGAMELUMINES                         orz"
"D:PSPGAMELuminesMS%"
-> "C:ChristofferLUMINE~1%"

it may look retarded but it will hide the corrupted file in your psp.

Yes you can use it on any memory card 32 meg or more... I use a 1Gig Sandisk.

This release is made for version 1.5 which need this 2 folders under PSPGAME... if you have 1.0 you may need the original launcher (only 1 folder)... i think it can be downloaded from http://www.ps2nfo.com/

1.51 and 1.52 will be cracked eventually. Too bad you upgraded though. Or maybe it was that when you bought it.

For now homebrew ONLY work on 1.0 and 1.5.
